name: COMBAT INSTINCT
detailed_description:
COMBAT INSTINCT is a fast-paced motion sensing first person fighting game originally designed for Virtual Reality Gaming experience. Run(using stand-still arm swinging), throw punches, guard, and dodge in this game as you'll do in an actual fight. Face diversified enemies, and gather BOOK OF REVELATION entries to reveal secrets of the world.

FEATURES:

    • ROUGH AND BRUTAL INSTINCTIVE FIGHTING

      Utilize different attacks to punish your enemies. Fights are tough, powerful enemies will appear, they've got their own skills and they will besiege you.
      Punch like a fighter, think like a fighter. Feel the surge of adrenaline in your veins.

    • DIVERSIFIED COMBAT STYLES BASED ON POTENCY

      Human history went different when some of us unsealed the potency within. Transcenders, they are called.

      Ranger, Caster, Raider, Stunner, Basher, they evolve diversified combat styles on the basis of their unique understanding of what "potency" is.

      What can a man become when he realized and mastered the real power that lies within him, How does transcending come to be, Why most of us is sealed for our lives and Who did this to us, the answers to all are remained to be revealed. Go find them in your own fight.

    • ROUGE LIKE GAMING EXPERIENCE

      The keys to reverse the apocalypse are scattered in 10 Singularities in the multiverse. But the singularities are constantly changing. Expect total different enemies.

    • SURVIVE TESTS IN THE BABEL TOWER

      Face fierce combat tests in the babel tower, one of the relic of the Forerunners. See whether or not you're one of the chosen fighters.

    • RECLAIM BOOK OF REVELATION TO REVEAL HUMAN'S DESTINY

      Evolutionism is the biggest lie, humans were chained at birth, and an apocalypse beyond understanding is looming on the horizon.
      The answer to all lies in BOOK OF REVELATION. Reveal the secrets of THE THREE RELICS and find out more. Fight your way to the truth. This is not a game about Drake, Rico or John. It's about you.

      Come Save the Galaxy.

short_description: Fight like hell in this real-man fight and adventure game dedicated to hard-core action gamers. Get prepared for lots of deaths, and see whether you’re the talented fighter the galaxy has been waiting for.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish*, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
